text:
Formal education includes The Ferrers School (September 1996 – July 2001) attaining GCSEs: 2×A*, 3×B, 4×C. Further education includes The Tresham Institute, studying half of a BTEC National Diploma in Performing Arts (8 Units), and Northampton College, achieving A/S/2 Levels in Film Studies (B), Film & Video (C), and Acting BTEC Award (Merit).

Parallel to formal study, Jof continued expanding technical literacy in computing, AV equipment, editing workflows, and web technology. His early exposure to performing arts and media studies directly contributed to the long-term development of communication skills, scripting, direction, and editorial decision-making.
